content.rendered:
The Ultimate Wimbledon Experience

“The King (or Queen) of all tennis tournaments, the Championships held each Summer at the All England Lawn Tennis Club in London are iconic in both sport and destination.”

What a match! Wimbledon and London provide the ultimate backdrop for the best in tennis and a fantastic luxury travel experience that will put you up close to the action and give you exclusive and private access to the best of Her Majesty’s London. Our Ultimate Wimbledon invites you to take in matches between the world’s top players from prime vantage points at Centre Court. Enjoy seating fit for royalty plus exclusive access to in-stadium lounges and restaurants. Then let us guide you gracefully onward into the finest that London can offer including dining with the chefs of Joel Robuchon, private access and butler service at a West End theatre and a very special evening ‘Live at The Ritz’. Your home for it all is one of the newest and best jewels in London’s hotel crown. The Corinthia Hotel has been an instant classic since its inception just a few years ago: classic luxury with every modern convenience, sumptuous bedding, all-marble bathrooms and over-sized rooms are complemented with award-winning restaurants and an amazing urban spa. Get ready to be immersed in privilege, luxury and the world’s best tennis.

Below you will find a suggested sample itinerary, please remember we will work with you to completely customize your preferred experience based on your tastes, desires and budget.
